review: Yes I was surprisingly delighted at the performance of the Google Chromecast HDMI.It performed much better than I imagined. I use it all the time!
author: francis j. oconnor jr.

review: It is an excelent product! Definitly not needed if you have a SmartTv, but there are apps like Google Music or Youtube that works great with chromecast, doing things that your SmartTv can't do.
author: Ricardo Contreras

review: Great product!!! it worked so well that a lotof my friends are buying it now, thank you!
author: Rocio A.

review: I must have misunderstood what this product does. I could not get Amazon prime programs at all hard to use . Sending it back.
author: Doretta

review: If I could give it less than a star, l would.
author: Mary Johnson

review: If you want a good experience go with the AppleTV. This thing is SLOW and the image isn't great.
